name: cursorlinehighlight
description: Apply configurable decorations on cursor line and selection lines.

cursorlinehighlight.selectionText.cursor.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.selectionText.single.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.selectionText.multiL.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text
Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.selectionText.multiC.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.diagnosticText.allOk.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text
Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.diagnosticText.probl.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.diagnosticText.okWor.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.diagnosticText.okEdi.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.diagnosticText.warni.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text
Must be a single line text

cursorlinehighlight.diagnosticText.error.patternErrorMessage: Must be a single line text
Must be a single line text

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
